content: take a traditional knitted christmas stocking and add a flurry of little dots this stocking is knit in one piece from the top down with a simple short row heel **materials ** aran weight yarn mc blue 160yds / 146m cc white 60yds / 55m 4 5mm / us7 dpns 5mm / us8 dpns 2 stitch markers **finished measurements ** 12 / 30 5cm top circumference x 13 / 33cm length from top to heel
